title: How to Make a Tea Cigar

steps.title: Get a package of tea and open it.
steps.content: Get a package of tea and open it.

steps.title: Remove the actual tea bag and separate it from the paper and string.
steps.content: Remove the actual tea bag and separate it from the paper and string.

steps.title: Wrap the tea bag and the paper to create a small roll.
steps.content: Wrap the tea bag and the paper to create a small roll.

steps.title: Tie the string to secure the bundle.
steps.content: Tie the string to secure the bundle.

steps.title: Light one end up and smoke it.
steps.content: Light one end up and smoke it.
